TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BackEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

Docs.remarks:
## Remarks This is passed to the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.BackEventHandler> delegate when a <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.Back> event occurs.
A <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.Back> event occurs when the user has navigated to a drillthrough report and clicks the **Back** button to return to the parent report. The parent report is passed as an argument to the delegate that handles the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.Back> event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.Report parentReport) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.BackEventArgs"> class.
Gets the parent report of the drillthrough report.
